content: mini stocking by emily kintigh finished measurements approximately 7 tall including loop and 2 75 across materials us size 6 4mm dpns knit picks wool of the andes worsted- c1 white c2 firecracker heather c3 forest heather one ball each yarn needle gauge 24 sts and 32 rnds = 4 inches in stockinette st notes the stocking is worked in the round from the cuff to the toe an i-cord loop is then worked and sewn on there are three options for the body of the stocking all three start out with the same cuff after working the cuff choose the directions for the three color striped version two color striped version or solid color version the toe is then worked and is the same for all three versions for pattern support contact emily kintigh at auntieemsstudio@gmail com directions cuff with c1 loosely co 32 sts pm and join in the round being careful not to twist the sts round 1 p to end round 2 k to end repeat rnds 1-2 another 3 times then round 1 once more move onto directions for three color striped version two color striped version or solid color version three color striped version two color striped version solid color version leg leg leg rnds 1-2 with c2 k to end rnds 1-2 with c3 k to end rnds 1-15 with c2 k to end rnds 3-4 with c3 k to end rnds 3-4 with c1 k to end rnds 5-6 with c1 k to end repeat rnds 1-4 twice more then heel repeat rnds 1-6 once more then rnds 1-3 the heel is worked using short rnds 1-5 row when working a wrapped heel stitch pick up the wrap s and heel the heel is worked using short work it with the stitch the heel is worked using short row when working a wrapped row 1 with c1 k15 w&t row when working a wrapped stitch pick up the wrap s and row 2 p14 w&t stitch pick up the wrap s and work it with the stitch row 3 k13 w&t work it with the
